original: phur pa lha rgyud kyi bstod pa rgyud las gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: phur ba lha brgyud kyi bstod ba brgyud las gsungs ba ni

original: h'u shin tu mi bzad dpal chen 'bar ba'i sku //
analyzed: hu shin tu mi bzad dpal chen bar ba sku

original: zhe sdang thugs mchog nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod //
analyzed: zhe sdang thugs mchog nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod

original: chos sku ye shes mnga' brnyes gzhon nu'i tshul //
analyzed: chos sku ye shes mnga brnyes gzhon nu tshul

original: rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rdo rje gzhon nu sku la phyag tshal bstod

original: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa'i yum //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad skyed ba yum

original: bde chen dbyings nas sprul pa'i 'byung gnas gtso //
analyzed: bde chen dbyings nas sprul ba byung gnas gtso

original: rak+sha dpal gyi sku la dgyes par 'khril //
analyzed: rak+sha dpal gyi sku la dgyes ba khril

original: chos nyid dbyings chen 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma //
analyzed: chos nyid dbyings chen khor lo rgya debs ma
